titleStmt.title: A godlie and fruitfull treatise of faith and workes. Wherein is confuted a certaine opinion of merit by workes, which an aduersary to the gospell of Christ Iesu, held in the conference, had in the Tower of London
titleStmt.author: H. D., fl. 1583.
Dod, Henry, attributed name. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by H. Bynneman] for Gregory Seton, and are to be sold at his shop vnder Aldersgate,

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: H. D., i.e. Henry Dod?--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
